headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Grotti Turismo Classic
content: Call it old-fashioned, but you’re sick of space-age hypercars with dashboards that are smarter than you. You want something that’s stripped-back, as pure and primal as a bird of prey or a hard-on in the morning. Enter the Turismo Classic, a thing of automotive beauty engineered to take you back to a time when the gas was cheap, the ozone was thick, and the cops were at least as drunk as you.
